overview:
Sean Ren is a software developer, UI designer, and entrepreneur. He is graduating from University of Washington in by autumn 2010, with a bachelor degree in computer science. Sean is an aspiring entrepreneur that always motivated by innovations and new technologies in the web start-up field.

Sean is one of the co-founders of eberri, a stealth start-up launching a new way to use, search, and discover the web. Sean is specialized in web front-end development and user interaction design for eberri.
